mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prescription_content ( prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency, prescription_num,prescription_refund_available_num, prescription_day, prescription_unit_price, prescription_content_fee, prescription_content_actual_unit_price) VALUES (#{prescription_id}, #{prescription_consumption}, #{prescription_medicine_id}, #{prescription_frequency}, #{prescription_num},#{prescription_refund_available_num}, #{prescription_day},#{prescription_unit_price}, #{prescription_content_fee}, #{prescription_content_actual_unit_price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_num>0

SELECT prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency,prescription_day, prescription_content_actual_unit_price,prescription_unit_price, sum(prescription_num) AS prescription_num FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} GROUP BY prescription_id, prescription_consumption, prescription_medicine_id, prescription_frequency,prescription_day, prescription_content_actual_unit_price,prescription_unit_price
SELECT sum(prescription_num) FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_medicine_id = #{prescription_medicine_id}
SELECT * FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_medicine_id = #{prescription_medicine_id} AND prescription_num>0
SELECT * FROM prescription_content WHERE prescription_id = #{prescription_id} AND prescription_num > 0
